root: ^…Spike are you carrying a rabbit in a sling?
^Oh my lad, you never cease to surprise me you do.
^Not to say this old bogie doesn’t have a couple of surprises up his sleave…
^…ta-da! One locket freshly fished from the bottom of the river.
^You old codger, surprised you didn’t drown.
^Heh, I may be the elder of you two sprouts, but my eyes are still as sharp as a broken bottle.
^I presume this is an explanation for why you two are sopping wet?
^Maybe, maybe not. Could have been a freak tropic rainstorm.
^Hah! Well these days I wouldn’t be shocked I suppose.
^Well I have good news for you both, I have set up the tents and made the firepit ready.
^Excellent! I’m glad you had a fruitful trip.
^I too have gathered food and prepared everything for dinner.
^Though I’ll let you do the cooking Box.
^Right you are, always happy to provide for my family.
^…what are you then Spike, the too-cool-for-family high-school-dropout-punk-rock-brother?
^They finally made a crack at a bloody joke?!?
^Oh I heard it alright my lad.
^I was just trying to join in the fun…
^Oh don’t you worry, I ain’t mocking ya.
